exportformats:documentation.div: This export format generates an Arduino sketch file (.ino). using the Arduino IR library Infrared4Arduino (see also this).
If the signals uses a protocol directly supported by Infrared4Arduino (presently NEC1 and RC5), the parametrized form is used, otherwise the raw form.

Limitations:
Does not respect the remote/commandset structure; just throws all commands together.
Does not support ending sequences (ignores them).
Does not support toggling signals (includes only the first one).
Does not detect obvious data duplication, like repeats that are all equal.
